com.simsilica.lemur

Class RollupPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jme3.scene.Spatial
      • com.jme3.scene.Node
        • com.simsilica.lemur.Panel
          • com.simsilica.lemur.RollupPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.jme3.asset.CloneableSmartAsset, com.jme3.collision.Collidable, com.jme3.export.Savable, com.jme3.util.clone.JmeCloneable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class RollupPanel
extends Panel
    A panel that expands or collapses its contents based on pressing a title bar button.
